A: Type

empty: A
cover_inv_leaf_aux: forall (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> forall a : A, t = leaf a -> l = leaf a :: nil
============================
forall (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))

Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive cover : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t | cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3 Arguments cover _%list_scope Arguments cover_node (_ _)%list_scope
node : forall A : Type, btree A -> btree A -> btree A
leaf : forall A : Type, A -> btree A

permutation : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop

cover_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> P l1 t3) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), cover l b -> P l b

cover_cons_l : forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 : list (btree A)), cover l1 t1 -> cover (t2 :: l1) (node t2 t1)
cover_in_inb : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t2 t1
cover_node : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), permutation l1 (t1 :: t2 :: l2) -> cover (node t1 t2 :: l2) t3 -> cover l1 t3
cover_in_inb_inb : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), cover l t1 -> In t2 l -> inb t3 t2 -> inb t3 t1
cover_inv_leaf : forall (a : A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (leaf a) -> l = leaf a :: nil
cover_not_nil : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l t -> l <> nil
innodeR : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t2 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
innodeL : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A), inb t t1 -> inb t (node t1 t2)
one_cover_ex : forall l : list (btree A), l <> nil -> exists t : btree A, cover l t
inb_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : btree A -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, P t t) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t1 -> P t t1 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> (forall t t1 t2 : btree A, inb t t2 -> P t t2 -> P t (node t1 t2)) -> forall b b0 : btree A, inb b b0 -> P b b0

cover_one_inv : forall t1 t2 : btree A, cover (t1 :: nil) t2 -> t1 = t2
inb_antisym : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> inb t2 t1 -> t1 = t2
cover_one : forall t : btree A, cover (t :: nil) t
distinct_leaves_l : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), distinct_leaves (node t1 t2) -> distinct_leaves t1
app_inv_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: b :: l4) \/ l1 = l3 ++ a :: nil /\ l2 = b :: l4
distinct_leaves_r : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), distinct_leaves (node t1 t2) -> distinct_leaves t2
number_of_nodes_inb_le : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> number_of_nodes t1 <= number_of_nodes t2
inb_trans : forall (A : Type) (t1 t2 t3 : btree A), inb t1 t2 -> inb t2 t3 -> inb t1 t3
app_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: l4)
exist_first_max : forall l : list nat, l <> nil -> exists (a : nat) (l1 l2 : list nat), l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l1 -> n1 < a) /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l2 -> n1 <= a)
permutation_one_inv_aux : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall a : A, l1 = a :: nil -> l2 = a :: nil
permutation_cons_ex_aux : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall l11 l12 : list A, l1 = l11 ++ a :: l12 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation (l11 ++ l12) (l3 ++ l4)
number_of_occurrences_permutation : forall (A : Type) (eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) (l1 l2 : list A) (a : A), permutation l1 l2 -> number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l1 = number_of_occurrences eqA_dec a l2
permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0

``` 
intros t t1 t2 l Hcov Heq.
rewrite <- Heq.
right.
exists (node t1 t2 :: nil), nil.
split.
- split.
  + apply cover_node_inv with t1 t2.
    * apply Hcov.
    * reflexivity.
  + apply cover_one.
- apply permutation_refl.
```
